price: 76. Nuuxna waa badbaadinnay, markuu noo dhawaaqday kol hore21. Waana ka ajiibnay baryadii, oo ka samatabixinnay isaga iyo intii raacday musiibadii weyneyd (harqintii qoonkiisii).
arabic: وَنُوحًا إِذۡ نَادَىٰ مِن قَبۡلُ فَٱسۡتَجَبۡنَا لَهُۥ فَنَجَّيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡكَرۡبِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
footnotes: 21. Macnaha uu habaaray qolodiisii kuwaasoo ku adkeystey shirkiga iyo macaasida.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wanūḥan idh nādā min qablu fa-is'tajabnā lahu fanajjaynāhu wa-ahlahu mina al-karbi al-ʿaẓīmi
